post.body: hey part of that sneaker came from my grandma's sofa! lol j/k
lol right I know it was like 15ppl there. I just didn't feel like shoveling my way out of the driveway *lazy*
but I put Rudolph in!!!! That's my dad's jam, yeah perhaps I should have put both lol
but mint choc chip is my fav :-(
yeah no, i went from the shower srt8 to my pj's lol i wish i did go tho i wonder how it went?
i'm joyful! lol check out my new column http://tinyurl.com/6zh89y i'm gonna hafta do a feature on U!
hey!!!! how are you?!
joy is a state of being, happiness is an emotion, I'd rather be joyous!!
ewwwwwwwwwww that is a horrific thought bleahhhhccchhh
ooh I have a cookie question!!!??? so I have these oatmeal cookies what should I put in em in addition to choc chips?? rum? :-)
lol yes you did, merci!
I'm good hon, mom went back into the hosp this morning :-( but besides that everything is everything
hi honey!!!!! how's peanut? I freakin love Jumanji thanks for the heads up!
awww but we love you! i think you just have the wrong tour guides
lol yeah it's really cool, it's a guy's show too. grease fat and cheese lol
i like it too but, i can only take so much of that show before I start to feel my arteries clog vicariously lol
po baby, you need some empathy mama? woo woo woo *pats your back*
yeah it's -1 *points at my face*
I'm gonna have a NYE party YAYYYY!!!!!!!!!!
ok it's 3 degrees... Imma need ol' man winter to cut it out
